author: Dylan Shield (Shieldia.co)
description: Detect User-Agent based Cross Site Scripting attempt in webserver logs
name: SIGMA - Web Apache Correlation XSS in User-Agent Attempt
query:
from logs-apache.access-default metadata _id, _index, _version | where user_agent.original like "*<script>*" or user_agent.original like "*</*" or user_agent.original like "*alert(*"
| eval timebucket=date_trunc(5minutes, @timestamp) | stats value_count=count_distinct(user_agent.original) by timebucket, source.ip, host.name
| where value_count >= 1
